content.raw:
I got the same issue while testing on constellations machines. To reproduce:

```
roslaunch atlas_utils vrc_task_2.world
roslaunch atlas_utils ros_subscribers.launch
pub_atlas_command
```
Latest stable packages, only happening in world2. Exactly the same as @GoRobotGo.

Easy to see running top. The machine will start to swap after some minutes, and you probably end up with OOM killer in action or something with a bad_alloc exception.
